rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles by keeping the main door south-facing.

A spacious living area that integrates indoor-outdoor connectivity through large sliding glass windows to connect with the garden. The open-plan design ensures natural airflow and eco-friendly energy efficiency.
A dedicated work space designed for productivity, featuring north-east orientation for positive Vastu influence, soundproofing and integrated smart lighting solutions.
An eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and proper ventilation. The dining area is adjacent to the living area for family gatherings.
A compact guest bathroom located near the entrance for convenience; it includes water-saving fixtures and natural light.
A dedicated utility space for storing eco-friendly cleaning supplies, recycling, and general household items. Incorporates sustainable materials in design.

openings.type: wooden door with energy-efficient glass panels
large sliding window for natural ventilation and light
double-glazed window to ensure thermal comfort
